Since the initial publication in November 2011this game has received positive reviews and has been played by more than 200 million users. No wonder this game has been called one of the best sandbox games of all time.

Minecraft Java Edition is a PC video game with a sandbox concept that allows players to explore the game’s territory and build whatever they want.

There are five game modes to choose from, namely Survival Mode, Adventure Mode, Creative Mode, Hardcore Mode and Spectator Mode. You could say survival mode is still the favorite of most gamers, gangs.

This is because you have to dodge attacks from mobs, one of which is to build a house. Apart from that, you can also gather various resources to construct buildings or craft equipment.

Instead of getting curious about the game, just download Minecraft Java Edition APK so you can start playing right away.

Download Minecraft Java Edition for free

1. Open the Mineshafter website

2. Download the latest version of Minecraft Launcher

  • Click on the word Download
  • Click Next Page Minelike launcher
  • If your browser has detected the virus, don’t worry, click Keep to download the file

Note: You must have Java 8 or a recent version installed on your PC.

3. Installation Manual

  • Now double click on the downloaded Minecraft Launcher file and install it on your PC.
  • The initial view will be like this. Enter the username and password or create a new account here.
  • Next, select the Minecraft Java Edition version and then click Play. Now Minecraft will download the necessary data, so make sure you have a fast and stable internet connection.
  • When the data download is complete, Minecraft Java Edition will open automatically and you can play offline.

Minecraft Java Edition Features

After you download Minecraft Java Edition for free, there are some other things you should know that are features of Minecraft Java Edition.

1. Supports player-made skins and MODs

Even if you play the official version of Minecraft Java Edition APK, you can still use Minecraft MOD APK, so you can get many benefits while playing.

In addition, you can use skins created for you by players to apply to your character so that it doesn’t look boring, gang.

2. Play with friends in Realm

Realm is a personal multiplayer server that you can share with your friends. This makes the game safer as you only play with people you know.

Once you allow your friends to play in the same realm, they can access it at any time, whether you’re online or not.

3. Early Access to New Features

You can access screenshots that will help you see what new features will be included in the next update.
